speaker: Dean
lines: The Dean's office smells of ink and peppermint.
Scroll tubes stand at attention; a plant attempts photosynthesis by candlelight.
The Dean peers over lenses that magnify patience.
'You have the look of a syllabus getting longer,' they say.
They sign a note without reading; the note reads itself and nods.
'Arcanum at two bells, Training at four, Archives when you can behave.'
A paper crane lands on your shoulder and refolds into a permission slip.
'If the Archmage asks for you, pretend you were on your way.'
